name: Do my groceries
body:
# Do my groceries
Do my groceries will be the first application of the helpingoldies project.
## Helping Oldies
The helpingoldies project aims to provide tools to help older people that are not so mobile.
## Do my groceries
This app will provide a tool for older people where they can make groceries list and ask other people to do their groceries for them.
## Help
This project is still in its early days and is desperately searching investors and other people that want to help. Just send a mail to rob.swartenbroekx@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
